question: Noah has 65 square meters of blueberry field. There are 16 blueberrys per square meter. Noah can harvest his blueberrys every 1 months. How many blueberrys can Noah harvest within a year?
answer:
Noah has 16*65= <<16*65=1040>>1040 blueberrys on his field.
Noah can harvest his blueberrys 12 / 1 = <<12/1=12>>12 times per year
Therefore Noah can harvest 1040*12 = <<1040*12=12,480>>12,480 blueberrys per year.
#### 12,480
